M_INLINE uint64_t h2n_uint64_t ( uint64_t  val)

Definition at line 28 of file endutil.h.

{
  QUAD a,b;
  
  a.n64 = val;

  b.n32.word_a = htonl( a.n32.word_b );
  b.n32.word_b = htonl( a.n32.word_a );

  return b.n64;
}
